entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning then changing to a few rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
